item.title: Tuesday, November 19, 2019
item.description: Lesson 5: Variables Do Now: Write the new vocab for Lesson 5 on your T-Chart Watch the video on the big screen Complete Level 3 in Code.org Complete Level 4 in Code.org Complete Level 5 in Code.org Exit Ticket: Explain to Ms. Brittney what a variable is
